content.prompt: Which of the following code segments assigns the same value to result as the preceding code segment for all values of str?

choices.label:
int result = 0; 
if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) 
{
   result = 3; 
}
else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) 
{
   result = 2; 
}
else if (str.length() > 5); 
{
   result = 1; 
}

int result = 0; 
if (str.indexOf("A") < 0) 
{

      result = 1; 
   }
   else if (str.indexOf("B") < 0) 
   {
      result = 2; 
   }
   else 
   {
      result = 3; 
   }
}

int result = 0;
